name: Swelter RTS
description:
★Full Version - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.igesiastudio.swelter

Classic real-time strategy with direct combat control just like in the good old days! This game is for real commanders who are ready to smell victory and anticipation of a fierce battle. Here there is the extraction of resources by harvesters, the construction of a base, superweapons and many different units.

Join the community!

★Discord - https://discord.gg/huCa2qrru6

★VK - https://vk.com/swelterrts

Swelter : Minds Downfall - is a real-time strategy (RTS) game in the best tradition of old classic PC RTS games. Command, conquer and defeat your enemy on the battlefield.

"Humanity, divided into two groups after a nuclear war, is trying to fight back against the crazy Artificial Intelligence in order to survive"

The game will still be updated. In future updates you will find:

  • 1. New maps
  • 2. Capture Mode
  • 3. Map editor
  • 4. Bug fixes and optimization

The backstory of the game

After the nuclear war, society was divided. Mankind survived, but fought within the walls of various shelters. They were controlled by the remnants of the government. Then it was decided to unite all people into one superstate which was nicknamed the Legion. They decided to elect a single emperor of the whole Earth. Not all people liked this approach. Thanks to one mad scientist, Mr. Kirshner managed to create artificial intelligence. Artificial Intelligence discovered the law of "Magnetic Escalation", thanks to which it was possible to collect large pieces of ore in one place in a short time. Also, AI invented many technologies that saved humanity and gave the green light. After a while, the AI turned off and disappeared. Dr. Kirchner escaped and was never found. Those people who were angry at the slavish conditions of the government and the anarchy of the emperor decided to unite in their group and fight back against this monarchical system. This is where the game starts...

FEATURES

► A pure RTS with no microtransactions

► Campaign, skirmish, defence, and capture missions, with full AI

► Over 35+ unique land and air units for balanced gameplay

► Three warring factions, each with their own features, unique combat units, strengths, and weaknesses.

► Classic RTS direct control system. You can control each unit directly!

► 20+ missions for each faction

► Different types of superweapons, from a nuclear missile to a portal

► Fully scales from phones to big screen tablets
